title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Optimal Control Design for Wastewater Treatment Processes

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of control theory, programming (e.g., Python), and basic machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Practical skill-based learning for pre-professionals in medical, legal, and engineering fields within a BYOD setting.

learning_goals: Explain the IOQL algorithm design process for solving optimal control problems in nonlinear systems
Analyze and optimize efficiency/cost-effectiveness metrics of reinforcement learning-based control algorithms through wastewater treatment process simulations
Quantitatively evaluate IOQL's learning speed and cost-reduction effects compared to conventional control methods

resources: Wastewater Treatment Process VR Simulation Platform

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
